tool_description: Get the LinkedIn code for any city, region or country by passing in name.
name: LinkedIn geoUrn Codes
title: LinkedIn geoUrn Codes

api_list.name: api/location
api_list.description: LinkedIn uses GeoUrn Codes to identify locations in the browser url.  For example, if you want to see all the jobs in London, United Kingdom, you would need the GeoUrn for London, which is 102257491  Please note: This database contains about 30,000 (global) GeoUrn codes for major cities in around the world.   We are constantly updating our database with new GeoUrns.  We also provide a reverse lookup so that providing the code we can provide the locations in the format, for e.g. "London, England, United Kingdom".
